name: iJiya
overview:
iJiya is tagging service to simplifying any complicated address to simple one TAG , it helps people to share and distribute tag amongst desired one, still there is few specific benefits for each group of user as show below

A way WE use iJiya? • Tag place you BORN • Tag Place you study • Tag Place you like to go again and again • Tag place where you find your first love • Tag place where you first kissed her/him • Tag your first home • Tag your new office • Tag your new Home • Tag your this vacation plan to visit. • Just think a way to save any location for your memories • There is Many reason to tag and spread for all of us amongst our friends and relatives. • I n all case it simply easily spread and communicate to whom you desire. A way Service Industry use iJiya? • Create TAG for each address you are going to provide service on your first visit using iJiya mobile apps. • Write iJiya tag to your Service or customer form • Save iJiya tag to your any online software or your application • During any service call from particular user just retrieved iJiya tag from your System • Enter it on iJiya mobile apps or online website to view location of customer • No matter your employees changed or not available who first visited location, just provide tag to any of your employees • Using iJiya Mobile apps, person able to find way from current location to destination • Make all service industry free from dependency of person who know local areas • No need to call customer each time for asking same address and route again and again • More accurate customer service and save time to finding address each time for new employees • Better planning for customer care to assign customer call to his representative.

A way Banking Industry use iJiya? • Each bank need to verify customer address proof for any type Loan • During first visit Create iJiya tag using mobile apps • Write down iJiya tag to loan account form • Analyze location based data using Tag • After transfer of banking staff, new Bank person easily find and identify address using iJiya tag no matter he aware of city or not • Better presentation about valuation of property in case of Home or Mortgage loan. • Identify over valuation • Define and implement area based valuation.
